Package com.nwollmann.jgame.graphics

Renderers and other components related to graphics.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameRenderer
    The parent interface of all renderers in the JGame framework.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorRenderer
    Draws a rectangle of the set color at the game object's position.
    GamePanel
    Not currently doing anything.
    GameWindow
    A window that the game renders into.
    GraphicsManager
    Manages everything related to the visual display of the game.
    TextRenderer
    Renders the given string at the given location, drawing a box behind it.

Package com.nwollmann.jgame.graphics Description

Renderers and other components related to graphics.
